decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (Design & Access Statement, 891 01, received 12 August 2014 and 891 02 (rev C), received 01 September 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the north facing wall of the roof extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a rear roof extension to the house including the insertion of 2 roof lights to the front elevation.
